name: Lane T. Harrison
content: home associate professor, cs +[ds, imgd, bcb] ltharrison_at_wpi.edu cv office hours: schedule a meeting upcoming travel: LAS @ NC State (June-July) bio Lane Harrison is an Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Worcester Polytechnic Institute. He directs the Visualization and Information Equity lab at WPI (VIEW), where he and students leverage computational methods to understand and shape how people engage with data visualizations and visual analytics systems. Prior to WPI, Lane was a PostDoc in the Visual Analytics Lab at Tufts (VALT), with Remco Chang. Lane received his PhD from UNC-Charlotte, home of the Charlotte Visualization Center, with Aidong Lu. publications (for post-2021 papers, please see google scholar which does a great job of indexingâ for nowâ¦)
